body:
Hey Guys
In light of recent events and discussions I have decided to create a suggestions and feedback thread for the Community channel.
body_tagged:
Hey Guys
In light of recent events and discussions I have decided to create a suggestions and feedback thread for the Community channel.
title: Avicus Community Channel Feedback

replies.body:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCNUoFGZs5T-3FMZreY0Y9TA

Avicus Alert goes for too long, I never watch all of it
replies.body_tagged:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCNUoFGZs5T-3FMZreY0Y9TA

Avicus Alert goes for too long, I never watch all of it

replies.body:
Just to add on Glesmon's point, the videos are far too long.
You spend too much time on each topic, and the mistakes need to be cut from the final product.

You also need to practice your script multiple times before recording so you don't have a hard time reading quotes etc.

Hope that helps.
replies.body_tagged:
Just to add on Glesmon's point, the videos are far too long.
You spend too much time on each topic, and the mistakes need to be cut from the final product.

You also need to practice your script multiple times before recording so you don't have a hard time reading quotes etc.

Hope that helps.

replies.body: tbh i love it how it already is
replies.body_tagged: tbh i love it how it already is

replies.body:
Obvious reading word for word from a script
Slow / poor delivery
Too long
replies.body_tagged:
Obvious reading word for word from a script

replies.body: I think it's useless garbage and I dislike your spam as much as I dislike your rip-off DramaAlert. *sigh*
replies.body_tagged: I think it's useless garbage and I dislike your spam as much as I dislike your rip-off DramaAlert. *sigh*

replies.body: Use actual drama, not random forums nonsense. Edit out crappy parts. Do interviews with entertaining people. Stop wearing green shirts when using a green screen. Use a bit of emotion in your "right into the news"
replies.body_tagged: Use actual drama, not random forums nonsense. Edit out crappy parts. Do interviews with entertaining people. Stop wearing green shirts when using a green screen. Use a bit of emotion in your "right into the news"
